name: Ghostdream
description: When you die, you normally have only one simple wish - to return and tell them - "Hey, guys - it's OK" But returning is not easy...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 900 Mhz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: supports all DirectX video cards DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: supports all DirectX compatible sound
